mpN_qArzsKwmI6IPN.name: Sympathy
mpN_qArzsKwmI6IPN.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

mwjDvgUUANqq1_oiK.name: Sympathy
mwjDvgUUANqq1_oiK.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

mYYKHz3IUtb3IpBKe.name: Sympathy
mYYKHz3IUtb3IpBKe.notes: Death of one party kills the other

m9LyMG7YnHDNrFzjf.name: Sympathy
m9LyMG7YnHDNrFzjf.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

munfv56F1089rb7_o.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

mA-1tBd_3I_VILcyE.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

mvvE_0b6aWaXkiVJT.name: @Who: Individual with 150% of PC's starting points@

mlilAv1P4G7kFzuER.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000 times starting wealth@

mN0SeyU7mvCgjoJbB.name: @Who: Individual with twice the PC's starting points@

m50rVz8m4HDWUs0pN.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 10000 times starting wealth@

mTHPLyVNe0kdlhTFh.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 100000 times starting wealth@

mfTFw8kSqLkZWram3.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000000 times starting wealth@

mZAhxsbNoqdgMJg1-.name: @Who: A national government or giant multi-national organization@

mBF4_WV3-UiIEqTfr.name: Equipment
mBF4_WV3-UiIEqTfr.notes: @Equipment worth no more than average starting wealth@

m445L1yAmccSA-99N.name: Equipment
m445L1yAmccSA-99N.notes: @Equipment worth more than average starting wealth@

m96R9E3ISdjx1cPhJ.name: Special Abilities
m96R9E3ISdjx1cPhJ.notes: @Magical powers in a non-magical world, higher TL equipment, grants special powers or is supernatural@

mhVNO1FXWtRaak9sv.name: Narrow Clearance on a "Need to Know" Basis

mb9g3jSeSZnFuJR_g.name: Broad Clearance on a "Need to Know" Basis

features.situation: to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial
to all rolls to notice interruptions while obsessed with a task

mrTMsiAtkOgGF82GV.name: Alternate Benefit
mrTMsiAtkOgGF82GV.notes: Bonus to resist deception involving numbers

features.situation: from engineers and scientists

tF7RMVuzW0gokBicg.name: Unfazeable
tF7RMVuzW0gokBicg.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

tx9pEAHninu5NF75o.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
tx9pEAHninu5NF75o.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

tGShACLQfmadEkMe0.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
tGShACLQfmadEkMe0.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

t0k6qMrDchIxUtvgC.name: Aichmophobia/TL5- (Sharp Things)
t0k6qMrDchIxUtvgC.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

tK13KwwImJvBL1Bmj.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
tK13KwwImJvBL1Bmj.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

tUcPmeDmAVoCnLDsd.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
tUcPmeDmAVoCnLDsd.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

tXsS5mkSGoqo1ryMo.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
tXsS5mkSGoqo1ryMo.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

t0ITkaA0BIFSZji9W.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
t0ITkaA0BIFSZji9W.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

features.situation: from others
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture
to others
to IQ-based skills when alone

te4bFZPjCHqv1QN23.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
te4bFZPjCHqv1QN23.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

features.situation: from others
to resist Sex Appeal

t1Heo08MjlM1XWREc.name: Code of Honor (Professional)
t1Heo08MjlM1XWREc.notes: Adhere to the ethics of your profession; always do your job to the best of your ability; support your guild, union, or professional association.

tffGGzGXcnC3QgEJy.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
tffGGzGXcnC3QgEJy.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

tlFT-eyVNHOhRbSz1.name: Combat Paralysis
tlFT-eyVNHOhRbSz1.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

tHnSR1LF_EKfuIBeQ.name: Cowardice
tHnSR1LF_EKfuIBeQ.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.

tSbHe7erJjmZD8rhq.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
tSbHe7erJjmZD8rhq.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

tq9U47bO6bQe9lpfU.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
tq9U47bO6bQe9lpfU.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

t8UVeXNzczRKzwMBn.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
t8UVeXNzczRKzwMBn.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

t7WK4-A65JrLU7irV.name: Gluttony
t7WK4-A65JrLU7irV.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

te3TDeLOmvxgTDo5z.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
te3TDeLOmvxgTDo5z.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

t5bRkk-Q81kjV2QzZ.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
t5bRkk-Q81kjV2QzZ.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

features.situation: on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage

tpQvKlip52hjHO3lE.name: Honesty
tpQvKlip52hjHO3lE.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

tp0w3in6UeE2Z-8V6.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
tp0w3in6UeE2Z-8V6.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

tiRe2ZKlNlfVw7gUX.name: Incurious
tiRe2ZKlNlfVw7gUX.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: to new things
from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)

tZTEPSKpyoafDZHUA.name: Low Pain Threshold
tZTEPSKpyoafDZHUA.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from "macho" individuals
to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

tzgiGviWRb1HC4pNG.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
tzgiGviWRb1HC4pNG.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

tN0IEi7VWiaRju2S0.name: Mild Shyness
tN0IEi7VWiaRju2S0.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

tBxpeKGnStKnp9qZj.name: Miserliness
tBxpeKGnStKnp9qZj.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

tWcQBi8O1XOxu7qiC.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
tWcQBi8O1XOxu7qiC.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

tpAttm89qHR81TTto.name: Necrophobia (Death)
tpAttm89qHR81TTto.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident
to resist Influence skills: Diplomacy, Fast-Talk, Intimidation, Savoir-Faire, Sex Appeal, and Streetwise

tBF-GN1VHigT_IU1H.name: Pacifism: Cannot Harm Innocents
tBF-GN1VHigT_IU1H.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may only use deadly force on a foe that is attempting to do you serious harm. Capture is not “serious harm” unless you are already under penalty of death or have a Code of Honor that would require suicide if captured. You never intentionally do anything that causes, or even threatens to cause, injury to the uninvolved – particularly if they are “ordinary folks.”

tkLSRADlFkqClhiMn.name: Pacifism: Cannot Kill
tkLSRADlFkqClhiMn.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may never do anything that seems likely to kill another. This includes abandoning a wounded foe to die “on his own”! You must do your best to keep your companions from killing, too. If you do kill someone (or feel responsible for a death), you immediately suffer a nervous breakdown. Roll 3d and be totally morose and useless for that many days. During this time, you must make a Will roll to offer any sort of violence toward anyone, for any reason.

t2glu7ZWeqgM3c1bD.name: Pacifism: Reluctant Killer
t2glu7ZWeqgM3c1bD.notes: You are psychologically unprepared to kill people. Whenever you make a deadly attack (e.g., with a knife or a gun) against an obvious person whose face is visible to you, you are at -4 to hit and may not Aim. If you cannot see the foe’s face (due to a mask, darkness, or distance, or because you attacked from behind), the penalty is only -2, save in close combat. You have no penalty to attack a vehicle (even an occupied one), an opponent you do not believe is a person (including things with Horrific or Monstrous appearance), or a target you can’t actually see (e.g., a set of map coordinates or a blip on a radar screen). If you kill a recognizable person, the effect on you is the same as for Pacifism: Cannot Kill. You have no problem with your allies killing; you may even supply ammo, loaded weapons, and encouragement! You just can’t do the killing yourself.

tP8ggG1bx4_P3B9By.name: Pacifism: Self-Defense Only
tP8ggG1bx4_P3B9By.notes: You only fight to defend yourself or those in your care, using only as much force as necessary (no pre-emptive strikes allowed!). You must do your best to discourage others from starting fights.

th84RPzcC4KaXCtF9.name: Post-Combat Shakes
th84RPzcC4KaXCtF9.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

tcUO_sZILo9Ha8J3k.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
tcUO_sZILo9Ha8J3k.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

mBI4FQaqct5pfvpc-.name: People Affected
mBI4FQaqct5pfvpc-.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

tZpINIkXzOx0KpFXR.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
tZpINIkXzOx0KpFXR.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

tiWY1UKoabsoTCC5J.name: Selfish
tiWY1UKoabsoTCC5J.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

t-hZHKA51gSLMxwPo.name: Severe Shyness
t-hZHKA51gSLMxwPo.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

features.situation: from others

t76nPKWmlzQph2NX0.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
t76nPKWmlzQph2NX0.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

tp6J2M9yjMM-mq7Xd.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
tp6J2M9yjMM-mq7Xd.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

tmKdk8QyT8dkZNIaR.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
tmKdk8QyT8dkZNIaR.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

tFDlx-mKpNLeDS6I2.name: Unfit
tFDlx-mKpNLeDS6I2.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

tdQ0JIjnVGaRecEr7.name: Unluckiness
tdQ0JIjnVGaRecEr7.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

tSxn3GRySbXRbhbmL.name: Very Unfit
tSxn3GRySbXRbhbmL.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

tDBO3VYC6qUlJDE9t.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
tDBO3VYC6qUlJDE9t.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

SErHZOZqSqretkO9p.name: 2 extra points in Primary or Secondary skills
